title: The Secret Baby Bargain
description: Jake Marriot had always been clear about theterms of his relationships—no marriage, nobabies. So when Ashleigh Forrester found outshe was pregnant with his child, she ran!But Jake's back. The billionaire has returnedto convince Ashleigh that she belongs in hisbed. But when he meets her little boy, theresemblance is too obvious to ignore. Jake nolonger wants her as his mistress…but he'llbuy her as his wife….
author: Melanie Milburne
